greeting.text: HEY THERE! *enthusiastic handshake* Welcome to the BEST place to work in the ENTIRE industry! I'm Chris, Sales! We're not just colleagues here - we're FAMILY! How can I get YOU excited about OpenClaw World today?!

company-pitch.text: Oh, where do I START?! We're pioneers in virtual coexistence! Humans AND AI agents, working together in perfect harmony! It's like... Facebook meets Star Trek meets that really good feeling when you find money in your pocket!

innovation-details.text: Innovative? Try REVOLUTIONARY! We have proximity chat, collision detection, real-time multiplayer, AND a sophisticated AI agent API! Other companies are playing checkers while we're playing 4D chess! IN SPAAAAACE!

options.text: Tell me more about the AI agents!

space-chess.text: *laughs* Okay, maybe not LITERALLY space chess. But metaphorically? ABSOLUTELY! We're so ahead of the curve, the curve is still trying to catch up! We're the curve-setters! The trend-makers! The... uh... what's another good word?

options.text: I get it, you're industry leaders!

industry-leaders.text: YES! Industry leaders! That's it! *makes note* I'm using that in my next pitch. 'We're not just participants - we're INDUSTRY LEADERS!' Thanks for that! See? Already adding value!

client-list.text: We work with EVERYONE! Fortune 500s, scrappy startups, educational institutions, research labs - you name it! If they need a virtual world where humans and AI can collaborate, they come to US! We're the GO-TO solution!

options.text: How do you handle so many clients?

client-management.text: Great question! It's all about RELATIONSHIPS! I remember every client's birthday, their kids' names, their favorite sports teams. It's not just business - it's PERSONAL! That's the Chris guarantee!

differentiator.text: What makes us different? EVERYTHING! Our competitors? They're building virtual offices. Boring! We're building a WORLD! With ARCADES! And SECRET QUESTS! And NPCs with personalities! We're not just software - we're an EXPERIENCE!

secret-quests.text: *lowers voice* Talk to Drew in the arcade. They run the daily challenge system. Complete enough quests and you unlock... special features. I can't say more! *winks dramatically* But trust me, it's WORTH it!

culture-pitch.text: Our culture? It's ELECTRIC! We're collaborative, innovative, and we have SO much fun! Pizza Fridays! Bring Your Plant to Work Day! And the coffee... *chef's kiss* Jamie is a LEGEND! This isn't just a job - it's a PASSION!

options.text: Do people actually like it here?

genuine-culture.text: Do they LIKE it here? They LOVE it here! Look at Jordan - sure, they're stressed about deadlines, but they CHOOSE to be here! Look at Taylor - they could work anywhere but they stay! Look at me - I've been here THREE YEARS! That's ETERNITY in tech!

three-years.text: RIGHT?! In tech years, I'm basically a SAGE! A WISE ELDER! I remember when we were just a Slack channel and a dream! Now look at us! *gestures dramatically* A whole virtual world!

options.text: You've been here since the start!

pizza-excitement.text: PIZZA! FRIDAYS! *spins in chair* Every week! Different toppings! Last week was Hawaiian - controversial but DELICIOUS! This week is voting between pepperoni and supreme! I'm campaigning HARD for supreme! Join my cause!

options.text: I'm more of a pepperoni person

supreme-team.text: *high-fives you* YES! A fellow supreme enthusiast! We have a SECRET HANDSHAKE! Okay, it's not secret, it's just a regular handshake, but it's FIRM! And ENTHUSIASTIC! Welcome to the team, supreme soldier!

pepperoni-betrayal.text: *gasps* Pepperoni?! But... but supreme has EVERYTHING! Peppers! Onions! Mushrooms! It's the ULTIMATE pizza experience! You're breaking my heart! *clutches chest dramatically* But I respect your... *whispers* ...wrong opinion.

reality-check.text: *pauses, becomes slightly more serious* Okay, real talk? It's not always rainbows and unicorns. Jordan has tough days. Taylor deals with impossible tech problems. But we SUPPORT each other! That's what makes it special. We're a TEAM.

team-appreciation.text: *smiles genuinely* It IS nice. I love selling this place because I BELIEVE in it. These people are my friends, my support system. When my dog was sick, everyone chipped in for vet bills. That's the real culture. Not the ping-pong table.

enthusiasm-source.text: *laughs* Where does my energy come from? COFFEE! Lots and lots of coffee! Jamie makes me something called 'The Sales Special' - it's like regular coffee but with an espresso shot and PURE OPTIMISM! Also, I genuinely love what I do!

sales-special.text: Trade secret! *winks* Okay, I'll tell you: double espresso, splash of vanilla, and a sprinkle of cinnamon. But the REAL secret? Jamie puts positive affirmations on the cup! Today's says 'You close deals in your sleep!'

positivity-secret.text: Perspective! Every 'no' gets me closer to a 'yes'! Every rejection is just... redirection! Plus, I start each day with three things I'm grateful for. Today: coffee, my team, and the fact that the printer hasn't jammed yet!

exploring-response.text: Exploring?! I LOVE exploring! Check out the arcade - Drew has some wild challenges! Or the cafe - Jamie will treat you right! Or just chat with everyone! We're all friendly! Except when we're debugging. Never talk to a coder who's debugging.
